Address.value: ONE VANDERBILT AVENUE, NEW YORK, New York, 10017, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SL Green is one of the largest Manhattan property owner and landlord, with interest in around 35 million square feet of wholly owned and joint venture office space. The company has additional property exposure through its limited portfolio of well-located retail space. It operates as a real estate investment trust.
